Package gui

Class InExamController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.InExamController
  • public class InExamController
extends java.lang.Object
    The InExamController class manages the test-taking process for a student, including tracking time, answers, and navigation between questions.

        public void setAdded​(logic.AddedTime added)
        This function sets the value of the "added" variable to the input parameter "added".
        Parameters:
        added - added is a parameter of type AddedTime which is being set using the setter method setAdded(). The setter method is used to set the value of the private instance variable added to the value passed as a parameter.

      • setStudentInTest

        public void setStudentInTest()
        setting studentInTest object, this object for saving student answers and quesId for each answer , and test Info, and student info .

      • setStudentAndClient

        public void setStudentAndClient​(logic.Users Student,
                                ChatClient client,
                                InExamController controller)
        This function sets the student and client objects and also sets the InExamController for the client object.
        Parameters:
        Student - An object of the class Users representing a student.
        client - The ChatClient object that represents the connection between the student and the server..
        controller - The parameter "controller" is an object of the class "InExamController". It is the class which responsiple for controlling Digital exam screen.
